Title: The Godfather
Description: The Godfather is the story of the Corleones, a fictional Mafia family operating in New York City. The novel focuses on the time directly following World War II, from 1945 to 1955, and opens at the wedding reception of Carlo Rizzi and Connie Corleone.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with crimes, their detection, criminals, and their motives.

Title: Inception
Description: A skilled thief is tasked with planting an idea into the mind of a CEO in order to prevent a monopoly.

Genre.Name: Science Fiction
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
Description: Two men form an unlikely friendship in prison as they navigate the harsh realities of life behind bars.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with human emotions and relationships.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
Description: An FBI agent seeks the help of a serial killer in order to catch another, more dangerous killer on the loose.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that is intended to provoke a feeling of suspense and excitement in the audience.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
Description: A young hobbit must journey across Middle Earth to destroy a powerful and evil ring before it falls into the wrong hands.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with imaginary worlds, creatures, and magic.

Title: The Social Network
Description: A drama that explores the founding of Facebook and the legal battles that ensued between its co-founders.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with human emotions and relationships.

Title: Jaws
Description: A great white shark terrorizes a beach community, prompting a group of men to hunt it down and kill it.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that is intended to provoke a feeling of suspense and excitement in the audience.

Title: The Departed
Description: An undercover cop infiltrates a gang while a gang member infiltrates the police department, leading to a violent and deadly confrontation.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with crimes, their detection, criminals, and their motives.

Title: Forrest Gump
Description: The life story of a man named Forrest Gump, who lives through several historical events and experiences many different emotions and relationships.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that deals with human emotions and relationships.

Title: Zero Dark Thrity
Description: The film dramatizes the nearly decade-long international manhunt for Osama bin Laden, leader of the terrorist network Al-Qaeda, after the September 11 attacks. This search leads to the discovery of his compound in Pakistan and the military raid where bin Laden was killed in 2011.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: A genre of fiction that is intended to provoke a feeling of suspense and excitement in the audience.
